t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - In March 2007, the company applied to expand the trademark to cover a more diverse list of goods. The brand was officially launched in 2009. Along with AmazonBasics, it was Amazon's first in-house brand. In September 2008, Amazon filed to have the name registered.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Trademark Registration | Trademark Engine
s: Your completed application will be filed with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). The Amazon Brand Registry provides greater protection of your brand and increases your visibility on the Amazon Marketplace. To participate, you have to have a registered trademark.
